thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York Attorney General Takes Aim at Presidential Pardons

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Attorney General Takes Aim at Presidential Pardons
text:
New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman on Wednesday asked state lawmakers to expand his powers to prosecute people who have received a presidential pardon.
In a letter to Gov. Andrew Cuomo and New York’s legislative leaders, Mr. Schneiderman, a Democrat, said: “Recent reports indicate that the president may be considering issuing pardons that may impede criminal investigations. This is disturbing news.”
He...
